lib

Class Step

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.Step

  • public class Step
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single step in the Recipe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Step()
      Creates a new step object.

        Adds a new ingredient to this step.
        Parameters:

        quantity - the amount of this ingredient required in this serving
